title: Our Favorite Cars, Drives, and Moments of 2021
description:
What was our favorite mid-engine car, front-engine car, truck, SUV, moment, or drive of the year? And what was our least favorite? That's what this podcast is all about. Matt Farah and Zack Klapman go through each category to compare notes. Plus, Matt drove the insane Lamborghini SCV12 on track, and we answer Patreon questions about EV swaps, E90 mods, our favorite Gran Turismo design, and watches. Recorded Dec 29, 2021 


Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store. 

Watch our new series, All Cars 3! https://youtu.be/rGMf-vs-2fQ

 

Want your question answered? Want to get ad-free episodes, early access, or a special 9th show each month? Join our Patreon!
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
